Headers With Style

No Header

Feeling Responsive allows you to use all kinds of headers. This example shows no header at all. Just the navigation.

Silence is beautiful. Sometimes you just want no distractions at all. Whether you like the content to speak for itself or enjoy pure typography on a plain background: Feeling Responsive got you covered. Just say no like this:

header: no

About Me

I am a lecturer in physical oceanography at the University of Southamton, England. My research interests span small-scale ocean physics to large-scale dynamics of the overturning circulation. I use observations - from ships, satellites, seagliders and moorings - as well as numerical simulations to investigate the oceans. More â€º
